titles: Straunge newes out of Calabria prognosticated in the yere 1586, vpon the yere 87. and what shall happen in the said yere: Praying the Lord to be merciful vnto vs.
author: Doleta, John, attributed name. aut
publisher: By G. Robinson for J. Perin?,
notes: Title from caption title on A3v; imprint from colophon.
Although Doleta is named as a "learned" man on A3r,v, he may be a fabrication--STC.
